Posts.Content: May 11, 2009 03:03PM busymomof5 wrote: Lainey, I just watched the Robin Roberts video. It was great. Thank you for sharing it. I am sooo sick of my wig. Last week I wore a bandana to my son's lacrosse game. Everyone has seen my wig and they seem comfortable with it. I do not think I am being paranoid but I believe people avoided me when I had just the bandana on. I have never worn it to a school event, just around the house. After watching the video, I do believe that the wig is to make other people feel comfortable. It does not scream "I am in treatment for breast cancer!" I have set an end date for the wig, June 10th. My hair is very blonde and is still sparse in places and very very short so I do look kind of bald but I am going to wear it proudly!
